items.title: The Role of Insurance in Securing Your Gold Loan
items.description: Taking a gold loan allows you to access funds quickly in times of need by putting up your gold jewellery as collateral.

items.title: Is It Better to Pledge Gold Coins or Jewellery?
items.description: Many people find themselves in need of cash in times of financial hardship. One way to access funds is by pledging valuables like gold coins or jewellery with financial institutions in exchange for a loan.

items.title: Impact of Loan-to-Value Ratio Changes in Gold Loan
items.description: Gold loans have surged in popularity amongst Indian households in recent years.
